itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer are joined by special guests The Hodge Twins.  You guys asked for them to be on, and they didn't disappoint.  In one of the funniest episodes in show history, these famous black conservative comedians go all ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer are joined by special guests The Hodge Twins.  You guys asked for them to be on, and they didn't disappoint.  In one of the funniest episodes in show history, these famous black conservative comedians go all in on Obama, the NFL, and slavery. Hilarious dudes.
